snippet: General Motors said it was recalling about 370,0000 of the pickups to reprogram software that could cause parts of the exhaust to overheat.
abstract: General Motors says it is recalling about 370,000 of its redesigned full-size Chevrolet Silverado and GMC Sierra pickups to reprogram software that could cause parts of exhaust to overheat.
lead_paragraph: General Motors said it was recalling about 370,0000 of the pickups to reprogram software that could cause parts of the exhaust to overheat.

headline.main: G.M. Announces Recall of Silverado and Sierra Trucks
headline.print_headline: G.M. Announces Recall of Silverado and Sierra Trucks
